Html:
Consider the following citation

[1] Green, A., Black, B., Gray, C., "The paper", IEEE, (5), pp.20-30, 2008.

With the ISO690 (first element and date), I see this in my text

We reference that (The paper, 2008).

However I want to see

We reference that (Green, 2008).


As you can see, the first element is considered as the title, however I want to place the surname of the first author.

Is there anyway to do that?
